original_title: Secrets in the Sky: The Untold Story of Skunk Works
overview: In 1943, in a circus tent in Burbank, CA, a bunch of revolutionary thinkers first gathered together in secrecy to build America's first jet fighter. They were rule benders, chance takers, corner cutters-people who believed that nothing was impossible. I
title: Secrets in the Sky: The Untold Story of Skunk Works
